name: Super Cool Shooter Game!
description:
Your wife divorces you and you are sent to prison. You must escape. So embark on this 2 minute adventure that will be completely buggy, hard and bad. This is probably the worst game uploaded in this Game Jam lmao.   

Uploaded for My First Game Jam 2021

The tiles that I used were made by LowResArtist which were completely free! Thanks

Thanks for Playing.
